## Format Date

Format date to `date` class.

```{r fmt_date_custom}
fmt_date_custom <- function(x) {
    out <- if (inherits(x, "POSIXt")) {
        lubridate::as_date(x)
    } else if (is.character(x)) {
        dmy(x)
    } else {
        NA
    }
    out
}
```

**Example:**

```{r}
fmt_date_custom("01/01/2020")
fmt_date_custom(Sys.Date())
```
